main_definition: Scuba is an acronym that stands for Self-Contained Underwater Breathing Apparatus, referring to the equipment used by divers to breathe underwater.

meanings_and_examples.example: He was certified in scuba diving and explored coral reefs.
She carefully checked her scuba gear before the dive.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who uses scuba equipment to dive underwater
meanings_and_examples.example: The experienced scuba diver guided us through the beautiful marine life.
